I wonder if anyone has tried calculating the derivatives of the 
therm=
odynamic properties from Cantera. I need to compute derivatives 
respect to=
 T and P for the internal energy, i.e., du/dT and du/dp. I 
would appreciat=
e any advice in this direction. I am using the Cantera 
toolbox in Matlab 7=
